messages.messageBody:
krisulam@... writes:


> J.J.
> I hope you foreword a copy of this post to whatever NPR show was airing at
> the time.
> -Krisula
>


Oh! Hadn't thought of that, thanks for the idea -- it was Talk of the
Nation. Maybe I will invite Favorite Daughter to do that if she'd like? (we
only have one dd, so that's what we call her.)

If anyone is further interested, I went to npr.org for the book and
program info:

"Women And Guns" Talk of the Nation audio
April 22, 2004
Guest:
Caitlin Kelly
*Author of Blown Away: American Women and Guns

The audio link to cut and paste is:
http://www.npr.org/dmg/dmg.php?prgCode=TOTN&showDate=22-Apr-2004&segNum=4&
mediaPref=RM
